Trade/Device Name(s): IDEAL LIFE Gluco-Manager™M Blood Glucose Monitoring System
IDEAL LIFE Blood Glucose Test Strips, Model AGS-1112
IDEAL LIFE Control Solution, Model GCS-0104
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for IDEAL LIFE Gluco-Manager™M blood glucose monitoring system and accessories for self-testing of blood glucose in people with diabetes.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip or alternative sites by people with diabetes at home for self-testing as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
